00020    /* 
00021    * Constructor.
00022    */
00023    TanhCosineExternal::TanhCosineExternal() 
00024     : perpDirection_(0),
00025       width_(),
00026       externalParameter_(),
00027       periodicity_(),
00028       boundaryPtr_(0),
00029       nAtomType_(0), 
00030       isInitialized_(false)
00031    {}
00032    
00033    /* 
00034    * Copy constructor.
00035    */
00036    TanhCosineExternal::TanhCosineExternal(const TanhCosineExternal& other)
00037     : perpDirection_(other.perpDirection_),
00038       width_(other.width_),
00039       externalParameter_(other.externalParameter_),
00040       periodicity_(other.periodicity_),
00041       boundaryPtr_(other.boundaryPtr_),
00042       nAtomType_(other.nAtomType_),
00043       isInitialized_(other.isInitialized_)
00044    {
00045       prefactor_.allocate(nAtomType_);
00046       for (int i=0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00047         prefactor_[i] = other.prefactor_[i];
00048       }
00049    } 
00050      
00051    /* 
00052    * Assignment operator.
00053    */
00054    TanhCosineExternal& TanhCosineExternal::operator = (const TanhCosineExternal& other)
00055    {
00056       perpDirection_    = other.perpDirection_;
00057       boundaryPtr_      = other.boundaryPtr_;
00058       nAtomType_        = other.nAtomType_;
00059       isInitialized_    = other.isInitialized_;
00060       width_            = other.width_;
00061       periodicity_      = other.periodicity_;
00062       externalParameter_   = other.externalParameter_;
00063       int i;
00064       for (i=0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00065         prefactor_[i] = other.prefactor_[i];
00066       }
00067       return *this;
00068    }
00069 
00070    /* 
00071    * Set nAtomType
00072    */
00073    void TanhCosineExternal::setNAtomType(int nAtomType) 
00074    {  
00075       if (nAtomType <= 0) {
00076          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType <= 0");
00077       }
00078       if (nAtomType > MaxAtomType) {
00079          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType > TanhCosineExternal::MaxAtomType");
00080       }
00081       nAtomType_ = nAtomType;
00082    }
00083 
00084    void TanhCosineExternal::setExternalParameter(double externalParameter) 
00085    {  
00086       // Preconditions
00087       if (!isInitialized_) {
00088          UTIL_THROW("TanhCosineExternal potential is not initialized");
00089       }
00090      
00091       externalParameter_ = externalParameter;
00092    }
00093 
00094    
00095    /* 
00096    * Set pointer to the Boundary.
00097    */
00098    void TanhCosineExternal::setBoundary(Boundary &boundary)
00099    {  boundaryPtr_ = &boundary; }
00100    
00101    /* 
00102    * Read potential parameters from file.
00103    */
00104    void TanhCosineExternal::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00105    {
00106       if (nAtomType_ == 0) {
00107          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType must be set before readParam");
00108       }
00109       if (!boundaryPtr_) {
00110          UTIL_THROW("Boundary must be set before readParam");
00111       }
00112    
00113       // Read parameters
00114       //readBegin(in,  "TanhCosineExternal");
00115       read<int>(in, "perpDirection", perpDirection_);
00116       if (perpDirection_ < 0 || perpDirection_ >= Dimension) {
00117          UTIL_THROW("Invalid index for perpendicular direction.");
00118       }
00119       prefactor_.allocate(nAtomType_);
00120       readDArray<double>(in, "prefactor", prefactor_, nAtomType_);
00121       read<double>(in, "externalParameter", externalParameter_);
00122       read<double>(in, "interfaceWidth", width_);
00123       read<int>(in, "periodicity", periodicity_);
00124       //readEnd(in);
00125 
00126       // Initialize dependent variables (kT = 1.0)
00127 
00128       isInitialized_ = true;
00129    }
00130 
00131    double TanhCosineExternal::externalParameter() const
00132    { 
00133      return externalParameter_; 
00134    }

00137    * Return name string "TanhCosineExternal".

00139    std::string TanhCosineExternal::className() const
00140    {  return std::string("TanhCosineExternal"); }
